remarks: The order of an element is the same in a subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2015.)  (Proof shortened by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
submod.h $e |- H = ( G |`s Y ) $.
submod.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
submod.p $e |- P = ( od ` H ) $.
subgod $p |- ( ( Y e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. Y ) -> ( O ` A ) = ( P ` A ) ) $.
